configurelogsforchannel.name: ConfigureLogsForChannel
configurelogsforchannel.description: Grants permission to configure logs on the channel with the specified channel name

configurelogsforplaybackconfiguration.name: ConfigureLogsForPlaybackConfiguration
configurelogsforplaybackconfiguration.description: Grants permission to configure logs for a playback configuration

createchannel.name: CreateChannel
createchannel.description: Grants permission to create a new channel

createlivesource.name: CreateLiveSource
createlivesource.description: Grants permission to create a new live source on the source location with the specified source location name

createprefetchschedule.name: CreatePrefetchSchedule
createprefetchschedule.description: Grants permission to create a prefetch schedule for the playback configuration with the specified playback configuration name

createprogram.name: CreateProgram
createprogram.description: Grants permission to create a new program on the channel with the specified channel name

createsourcelocation.name: CreateSourceLocation
createsourcelocation.description: Grants permission to create a new source location

createvodsource.name: CreateVodSource
createvodsource.description: Grants permission to create a new VOD source on the source location with the specified source location name

deletechannel.name: DeleteChannel
deletechannel.description: Grants permission to delete the channel with the specified channel name

deletechannelpolicy.name: DeleteChannelPolicy
deletechannelpolicy.description: Grants permission to delete the IAM policy on the channel with the specified channel name

deletelivesource.name: DeleteLiveSource
deletelivesource.description: Grants permission to delete the live source with the specified live source name on the source location with the specified source location name

deleteplaybackconfiguration.name: DeletePlaybackConfiguration
deleteplaybackconfiguration.description: Grants permission to delete the specified playback configuration

deleteprefetchschedule.name: DeletePrefetchSchedule
deleteprefetchschedule.description: Grants permission to delete a prefetch schedule for a playback configuration with the specified prefetch schedule name

deleteprogram.name: DeleteProgram
deleteprogram.description: Grants permission to delete the program with the specified program name on the channel with the specified channel name

deletesourcelocation.name: DeleteSourceLocation
deletesourcelocation.description: Grants permission to delete the source location with the specified source location name

deletevodsource.name: DeleteVodSource
deletevodsource.description: Grants permission to delete the VOD source with the specified VOD source name on the source location with the specified source location name

describechannel.name: DescribeChannel
describechannel.description: Grants permission to retrieve the channel with the specified channel name

describelivesource.name: DescribeLiveSource
describelivesource.description: Grants permission to retrieve the live source with the specified live source name on the source location with the specified source location name

describeprogram.name: DescribeProgram
describeprogram.description: Grants permission to retrieve the program with the specified program name on the channel with the specified channel name

describesourcelocation.name: DescribeSourceLocation
describesourcelocation.description: Grants permission to retrieve the source location with the specified source location name

describevodsource.name: DescribeVodSource
describevodsource.description: Grants permission to retrieve the VOD source with the specified VOD source name on the source location with the specified source location name

getchannelpolicy.name: GetChannelPolicy
getchannelpolicy.description: Grants permission to read the IAM policy on the channel with the specified channel name

getchannelschedule.name: GetChannelSchedule
getchannelschedule.description: Grants permission to retrieve the schedule of programs on the channel with the specified channel name

getplaybackconfiguration.name: GetPlaybackConfiguration
getplaybackconfiguration.description: Grants permission to retrieve the configuration for the specified name

getprefetchschedule.name: GetPrefetchSchedule
getprefetchschedule.description: Grants permission to retrieve prefetch schedule for a playback configuration with the specified prefetch schedule name

listalerts.name: ListAlerts
listalerts.description: Grants permission to retrieve the list of alerts on a resource

listchannels.name: ListChannels
listchannels.description: Grants permission to retrieve the list of existing channels

listlivesources.name: ListLiveSources
listlivesources.description: Grants permission to retrieve the list of existing live sources on the source location with the specified source location name

listplaybackconfigurations.name: ListPlaybackConfigurations
listplaybackconfigurations.description: Grants permission to retrieve the list of available configurations

listprefetchschedules.name: ListPrefetchSchedules
listprefetchschedules.description: Grants permission to retrieve the list of prefetch schedules for a playback configuration

listsourcelocations.name: ListSourceLocations
listsourcelocations.description: Grants permission to retrieve the list of existing source locations

listtagsforresource.name: ListTagsForResource
listtagsforresource.description: Grants permission to list the tags assigned to the specified playback configuration resource

listvodsources.name: ListVodSources
listvodsources.description: Grants permission to retrieve the list of existing VOD sources on the source location with the specified source location name

putchannelpolicy.name: PutChannelPolicy
putchannelpolicy.description: Grants permission to set the IAM policy on the channel with the specified channel name

putplaybackconfiguration.name: PutPlaybackConfiguration
putplaybackconfiguration.description: Grants permission to add a new configuration

startchannel.name: StartChannel
startchannel.description: Grants permission to start the channel with the specified channel name

stopchannel.name: StopChannel
stopchannel.description: Grants permission to stop the channel with the specified channel name

tagresource.name: TagResource
tagresource.description: Grants permission to add tags to the specified playback configuration resource

untagresource.name: UntagResource
untagresource.description: Grants permission to remove tags from the specified playback configuration resource

updatechannel.name: UpdateChannel
updatechannel.description: Grants permission to update the channel with the specified channel name

updatelivesource.name: UpdateLiveSource
updatelivesource.description: Grants permission to update the live source with the specified live source name on the source location with the specified source location name

updateprogram.name: UpdateProgram
updateprogram.description: Grants permission to update the program with the specified program name on the channel with the specified channel name

updatesourcelocation.name: UpdateSourceLocation
